headline: AMD On Device AI Push And New Board Member Attract Investor Interest
summary: AMD (NasdaqGS:AMD) is expanding its work with GIGABYTE to advance on-device AI across gaming laptops, motherboards, and monitors. The company is also adding former Accenture CFO KC McClure to its Board of Directors, bringing additional finance and governance experience. For investors, this development connects to an area where significant PC and AI spending is moving: AI functions running locally on devices instead of purely in the cloud. AMD’s roles in CPUs and GPUs give it exposure to...
